SETTINGS.TITLE: Enterprise Settings
SETTINGS.ENABLE_PRICE_LOCK_LABEL: Lock Price Changes for Patient Invoicing
SETTINGS.ENABLE_PRICE_LOCK_HELP_TEXT: Enabling this feature will disallow users from modifying the prices of inventory items in the Patient Invoice module.
SETTINGS.ENABLE_PREPAYMENTS_HELP_TEXT: Enabling this feature allow patients to deposit funds with the institution at the cash window for future invoices.  If the patient has a creditor balance, their invoices will be automatically paid after invoicing.
